author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Southgobi Resources Qtrly Profit From Operations $2.9 Mln
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - SouthGobi Resources Ltd:
* QTRLY REVENUE $23.2 MILLION VERSUS $25.3 MILLION * Q1 PROFIT FROM OPERATIONS $2.9 MILLION VERSUS LOSS OF $4.1 MILLION FROM OPERATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
